nodes.text: Witches and Monsters is a featurette included in the Blu-ray and DVD release of Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Three. It covers the development of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' season three episodes "Nightsisters", "Monster" and "Witches of the Mist".

The featurette also explores Katie Lucas' involvement as a writer in the series, along with the creation and development of Asajj Ventress, the Nightsisters, Mother Talzin, Dathomir, and Savage Opress.
